article: One day, a Chinese student goes to study English in England. His family name is Sun. It is the  _ as the word "sun". England is a country with bad weather . It is often cloudy or misty  ,and it rains often, so the days there _ get much sunshine all the year. When the Chinese student gets to London, a tall _ policeman with a long face opens his passport   to check   it. The policeman finds the Chinese name "Sun" in the passport. He  thinks it is pronounced   just like the _ word "sun". So he says to the Chinese student, "I see your name is Sun, you're wanted here. You bring sunshine _ England, so we don't want you to go away ." They smile.
